name: Methane Combustion Furnace
description: Combusts Methane to get power. Requires Heat. [gray] Creator's note: I havent found a better way to make a non explosive heat generator, so this bllook looks like it doesnt work, but trust me it does, though it has to be constantly maintained. [green] Guide from Green: make a separate power grid [white] only [green] for the generators and then use electric diodes to connect it to everything else
